Topic.Title: Has Anyone Tried Implementing Perlin or Simplex Noise  in Quest?

Posts.EditableText:
I've tried myself a long time ago by using a JavaScript library that I found online. I was able to assign noise values to each tile (room) in my map but I couldn't assign biomes to the tiles. For whatever reason, an error would occur and I couldn't figure out what the issue was.

I was thinking about taking another stab at it but I was just curious if anyone else has done it successfully. 

I'm interested in making a colony sim in Quest and I think that noise would benefit it greatly.
Posts.HTML:
I've tried myself a long time ago by using a JavaScript library that I found online. I was able to assign noise values to each tile (room) in my map but I couldn't assign biomes to the tiles. For whatever reason, an error would occur and I couldn't figure out what the issue was.
